description:
8.11 adecorrelate
Apply decorrelation to input audio stream.

The filter accepts the following options:
name: adecorrelate

parameters.description: Set decorrelation stages of filtering. Allowed range is from 1 to 16. Default value is 6.
parameters.name: stages

parameters.description: Set random seed used for setting delay in samples across channels.
parameters.name: seed

source:
8.11 adecorrelate

Apply decorrelation to input audio stream.

The filter accepts the following options:

stages

Set decorrelation stages of filtering. Allowed range is from 1 to 16. Default value is 6.

seed

Set random seed used for setting delay in samples across channels.
